What kind of expectations are there about tournament scenarios?  Is 
there anything that the tournament scenarios should NOT like? [Members 
 of the tournament group can participate in this, but need to keep 
tournament group secrets SECRET.]

Also, considering the tournament is only 20 scenarios long, what type 
of teams are you considering?  Remember: every team has to have at 
least 4 members.

The team I am considering is 2 clerics and 1 fire elemental.  I 
haven't quite figured out who my 4th team member will be, but it 
wouldn't be a thief, a mage, a skeleton, or a ghost.
